title: Kim Jiyoung, Born 1982
description: Kim Ji-young is the most common name for Korean women born in the 1980s.Kim Ji-young is representative of her generation:At home, she is an unfavoured sister to her princeling little brother.In primary school, she is a girl who has to line up behind the boys at lunchtime. In high school, she is a daughter whose father blames her for being harassed late at night. In university, she is a good student who doesnâ€™t get put forward for internships by her professor. In the office, she is an exemplary employee who is overlooked for promotion by her manager. At home, she is a wife who has given up her career to take care of her husband and her baby.Kim Ji-young is depressed.Kim Ji-young has started acting out.Kim Ji-young is her own woman.Kim Ji-young is insane.Kim Ji-young is sent by her husband to a psychiatrist. This is his clinical assessment of the everywoman in contemporary Korea.
author: Cho Nam-Joo
